participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and introspective, enjoys deep conversations and exploring new experiences.
participant_1.background: I walk dogs for a living. I'm also a graduate student. I am an avid kayaker. I enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. My parents taught me survival skills.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, loves to engage in fun conversations and has a lively spirit.
participant_2.background: I'm ex military. I donate a part of my salary to charity each month. I volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. My favorite color is navy blue. I work fulltime in a shipyard.
